stopper_general_01: You can head this way later.
stopper_general_02:
You should see what you can find by exploring
the academy!
stopper_common_0030_01: You’re not quite ready to go to school yet.
stopper_common_0060_01:
You need to take these three Pokémon to your
neighbor’s house down the way!
stopper_common_0088_01: Miss Nemona awaits you at the beach, I believe.[npcn:A]
stopper_common_0095_01:
You haven’t chosen a Pokémon yet! Better go tell
the director which one you want.
stopper_common_0170_02:
You hear Houndoom barking an awful lot.
Maybe you’d better not go in there.
stopper_common_0170_03:
Things look dangerous ahead.
Better not get too close.
stopper_common_0220_01:
Nemona’s waiting for you! Better head toward
the academy!
stopper_dan_ajito_01:
Back up, kid! You can’t just casually waltz in here
like you’re one of us stars that run the joint![npcn:2F]
stopper_dan_ajito_02:
If you want in, ring the bell over by the entrance
and storm the base like a decent person![npcn:2F]
stopper_common_1300_01: The elevator doors are shut tight.
stopper_common_1180_01:
Try using the panel down below to open the gate
to the Zero Lab.
stopper_common_0130_01: You should go see if that Pokémon is all right!
stopper_gym_stopper_01:
You’re still in the middle of the Gym Test!
Better not go in the Gym right now.
